header.name: Pau Maestre Fernandez
header.subtitle: Passionate about programming and web development | Hobbyist Programmer

about.p1: I am Pau Maestre Fernandez, a web application development technician. I am currently studying a higher degree in Diagnostic Imaging and Nuclear Medicine, while on weekends I work as a hospital porter at the Bellvitge University Hospital.
about.p2: In my spare time I enjoy video games, series, and cinema. My favorite saga is Star Wars, which inspires me with its epic universe and memorable characters.

exp.desc: As a hospital porter, my responsibilities include:
exp.item1: Patient transportation through different hospital areas.
exp.item3: Logistical support in emergency and operating rooms.
exp.item4: Medical material distribution and patient guidance.
